SuiteInformation.Title: Test parameter setting
SuiteInformation.Description: This test suite for Linux systems performance evaluation.

Execute.Perf_cpu: tarbal=sysbench-0.4.12.tar.gz cpu_max_prime=10000,20000,30000 test_type=cpu runtimes=3 tag=cpu reboot=no

Execute.Perf_mem: tarbal=sysbench-0.4.12.tar.gz num_threads=[4,8] test_type=memory block_size=4096 total_size=8G runtimes=3 tag='cpu' reboot=no
